<a name="english"></a>
# English

This directory contains example files generated by all MCP Documentation Server tools.

## ğŸ“Š Diagrams

### C4 Architecture Diagrams

- **example_c4_context.png** - C4 Context Diagram (e-commerce system)
- **example_c4_container.png** - C4 Container Diagram (e-commerce platform)
- **example_c4_component.png** - C4 Component Diagram (Order Service)
- **example_c4_code.png** - C4 Code Diagram (OrderService class)

### UML Diagrams

- **example_uml_class.png** - UML Class Diagram (User, Order, Product)
- **example_uml_component.png** - UML Component Diagram (Web, API, Database)
- **example_uml_deployment.png** - UML Deployment Diagram (Server, Database Server)

### Sequence Diagrams

- **example_sequence.png** - PlantUML Sequence Diagram (login process)
- **example_mermaid_sequence.png** - Mermaid Sequence Diagram (API request flow)

### Flowcharts & Charts

- **example_flowchart.png** - Mermaid Flowchart (order processing)
- **example_gantt.png** - Gantt Chart (project timeline)

### Graphs & Architecture

- **example_dependency_graph.png** - Graphviz Dependency Graph (service dependencies)
- **example_cloud.png** - Cloud Architecture Diagram (AWS components)

## ğŸ“„ Documents

### Exports

- **example_export.pdf** - PDF export from markdown
- **example_export.docx** - DOCX export from markdown

### Templates

- **example_adr.md** - ADR (Architecture Decision Record) from template
- **example_api_spec.md** - API Specification from template

## ğŸ¯ How to Use

These files are examples showing the capabilities of each MCP tool. You can:

1. **Open files** - see how generated diagrams look
2. **Use as references** - see format and structure
3. **Compare** - check differences between diagram types

## ğŸ”§ Regeneration

To regenerate these files:

```bash
# Start containers
docker compose up -d

# Generate all examples
python3 scripts/generate_examples.py
```

## ğŸ“ Notes

- All files are generated by Docker PlantUML/MCP server
- PNG/SVG files are rendered by PlantUML server
- PDF/DOCX files are generated by Pandoc
- .md files are created from templates

## ğŸ“¦ File Sizes

- PNG diagrams: ~2-45 KB
- SVG diagrams: ~2-20 KB  
- PDF documents: ~20-30 KB
- DOCX documents: ~10 KB
- Markdown documents: ~1-2 KB
